triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs are the central technology that autonomous agents are built upon and which the survey examines.

triples.name: Autonomous agent
triples.relevance: Autonomous agents are the primary subject of the survey, representing systems that act independently in complex environments.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP is the fundamental technique underlying LLM-based autonomous agents and their ability to understand and generate text.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Machine learning is the foundational field that enables LLMs and autonomous agents to learn from data.

triples.name: Knowledge representation and reasoning
triples.relevance: Knowledge representation is essential for enabling autonomous agents to understand and reason about Web knowledge acquired by LLMs.
